validation.validation: Exempt type must be specified when Exempt is true.
Worker has no Position within this company. Tax Elections can only be created for Companies for which the Worker has a Position.
You can't change the Effective As Of date for an existing tax election. Either create a new tax election or use the current Effective As Of date for this tax election.
You can't change the company for an existing tax election. Either create a new tax election or use the current company for this tax election.
You can't change the worker for an existing tax election. Either create a new tax election or use the current worker for this tax election.
